===Noun===
{{ja-noun|つけたて}}

# {{lb|ja|painting|sort=つけたて}} a style of ink painting that avoids painting outlines, and requires a special brush called a [[tsuketatefude]].<ref>{{cite-web|url=http://www.aisf.or.jp/~jaanus/deta/t/tsuketate.htm|title=tsuketate　付立|accessdate=20 February 2011}}</ref>

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-def|付立筆}} a type of brush used in tsuketate-style ink painting
